prompts: Create a water-type Pokemon with a muscular build and blue skin.
I want a Pokemon that has amphibious traits and striking red fins.
Generate a creature that thrives in wetlands and has a powerful tail.
Make a design for a Pokemon that is both a fighter and a swimmer.
Imagine a creature that can adapt to both land and water environments.
Show me a Pokemon with a unique combination of strength and agility.
Design a Pokemon that is known for its impressive durability and resilience.
